name: Fusespace
description:
This is a retro space shooter based off of Galaga for the Retro Grade Jame 3. All assets used were free and the links to each asset are listed. 

The 1-bit Space Pack: https://lightcone-games.itch.io/the-1-bit-space-pack

Music: https://dos88.itch.io/dos-88-music-library/purchase
